title: Among English language non-fiction writers, whose style is your favorite? - Quora

response.answer_text: All of them. The whole point about the enjoyment (and benefit) of reading is from exposure to a wide range of writing styles. Variety is the spice of life, as the old saying goes. I always encourage the young in my circle of people NOT to have favourite authors and/or favourite writing styles in their reading material because it can mechanistically lock the person into just one flavour or ‘texture’ of the operations of the English language.
